}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== OEM SerComm (YS100B-SA1-1.0)
UPCs... *WNA1100-100NES (Retail unit) - 606449067798 *WNA1100-100NAR (Refurbished unit) - 606449075045
The WNA1100 is used as the wireless module for the '''Matterport''' MC200 3D Camera, per the [https://fcc.io/2AAS4/MC200 FCC filing for the device].
Default Wi-Fi device ID supported by Lego Mindstorms, although other adapters can be used too, per [http://www.legomindstormsrobots.com/lego-mindstorms-ev3/mindstorms-ev3-compatible-wi-fi-dongles/].
{{WiFiCert|WFA8387|12/17/2009}}
[[Category:English Documentation]]
